page.title: 15Springfield Events
page.content: The{Gala Week}starts on a Monday and ends on a Saturday. Last year we had the Army, a fancy dress competition, a pet show, a baby show, a bike competition, a trampoline, sports, horse rides, a barbecue and a Gala Queen. The competitions were "Guess the Height of a Helicopter," 5 a side football and fancy dress football,the Scottish dancers, a fire engine and an ambulance. This year it starts on the first of July and ends on the sixth. The last day is the best day, with stalls and games with a beer tent and sweet tent. This year there will be a Scottish Concert, fancy dress, a whist drive, a treasure hunt, fancy dress hockey, a barbecue, a concert by children and a disco.
